CustomField.formula: IF( /* 条件 */ AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OrderHeader__r.Distance_F__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(OrderHeader__r.GasolinePriceMaster__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(OrderHeader__r.GasolinePriceMaster__r.Price__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(VehicleMaster__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(VehicleMaster__r.FuelEfficiency__c)) ), OrderHeader__r.Distance_F__c/* km */ / VehicleMaster__r.FuelEfficiency__c /* km/L */ * OrderHeader__r.GasolinePriceMaster__r.Price__c /* ￥/L */ , NULL )
CustomField.label: 燃料費
